title: Mirror of Adjustment

fields.name: Threat:
fields.value:
35
Whenever visited, it will turn the visitor into another role of the same allignment, this may cross over factions.
Attacks made against you are negated twice.
Abnormalities are immune to this, unless stated otherwise.
Once someone visits this a 3rd time, all changed players will die, regardless of status, defense, protection or any other way that negates or delays death.
Wincon: Have the Mirror of Adjustment kill at least 2 people.

desc:

*“The satisfaction is only temporary though.”*
